author: elecharny
msg: Added the Van Nhu test which check that controls are correctly handled

author: elecharny
msg: - Changed the controlType from OID to LdapString, as suggested
- fixed the toString() method, which now return a Value which is not a pointer

author: ab
msg: Add "readdb" command - human interface to CrawlDbReader.

author: ab
msg: Add human-readable status names in CrawlDatum.
Implement a reader for CrawlDB, loosely inspired by NUTCH-114 (thanks Stefan!).
The reader offers similar functionality to the classic "readdb" command.

author: elecharny
msg: Fixed the grammar to handle a String instead of an OID for the control type
